entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
